game.name: LUMINEX QUARTET
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A JRPG featuring music. The curious boy Pato sets out on a journey with his childhood friend Belffie in search of legendary instruments. Eventually,they are bound to a great destiny. An adventure story with full Japanese voice acting for the main story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A JRPG featuring music. The curious boy Pato sets out on a journey with his childhood friend Belffie in search of legendary instruments. Eventually,they are bound to a great destiny. An adventure story with full Japanese voice acting for the main story.
